about_the_game:
Game Features:

Play alone, but compete with others. Defeat 5 bosses with the best time!
Climb the rankings and win rewards.
Learn your opponents, fight against time and your opponent.
The location changes during combat.
Each opponent is different and has its own unique attacks and locations.
Take care of your fitness and health, save medications.

About Game:


Dimension Warrior is an intense action-adventure game where you traverse through various dimensions, facing formidable foes in your quest to return to your own world. The core of the game revolves around defeating powerful bosses to progress through increasingly challenging stages, with each victory bringing you closer to the final showdown. Inspired by titles like Cursed Ronin, Borderlands, and Dark Souls, the combat is unforgiving, requiring precise timing, careful management of health and stamina, and a deep understanding of each enemy's unique mechanics.

As you battle through these dimensions, you must adapt to dynamic environments that shift unpredictably, adding an extra layer of challenge. Mastering these transitions is key to survival, as each boss presents distinct abilities and attack patterns that demand both strategy and skill. Healing items are scarce, so every decision counts—whether it's evading a lethal blow or finding the perfect moment to strike.

After each hard-fought victory, you discover a portal that brings you one step closer to your home dimension. But be warned, as the journey is treacherous, and only those who truly understand their enemies and the ever-changing battlegrounds will emerge victorious.

System:


In Dimension Warrior, survival hinges on carefully managing two critical resources: health and stamina. Your health is precious, as the enemies you face are powerful and unforgiving. Every encounter is a test of endurance, where a single mistake can be deadly. To stay alive, you'll need to use healing items, but these medikits are scarce and must be used wisely. Careless use could leave you vulnerable at a crucial moment.

Stamina is equally vital, as it governs your ability to dodge, run, and launch attacks. Every action you take depletes your stamina, meaning you must balance offense and defense carefully. If you exhaust your stamina, you’ll be left open to enemy attacks, unable to escape or strike back effectively. Managing these resources is key to success—ration your healing items, and always keep an eye on your stamina, as both could mean the difference between victory and defeat in this challenging world.

Gameplay:


The goal of Dimension Warrior is to defeat the fearsome creatures that inhabit different dimensions. Currently, there are five powerful bosses, each more formidable than the last, with unique and deadly special attacks. Your mission is to overcome these increasingly challenging foes and make your way back to your own dimension. However, if you fall in battle at any stage, you are sent back to the very first dimension, forced to start your journey all over again.

This relentless challenge is not just about survival—it's also about speed. You can compete against other players in a global leaderboard, where the time it takes you to defeat each boss and complete the game is tracked. For those who can conquer the game with the fastest times, there’s an additional incentive: every six months, players with the top times will be awarded exclusive prizes!

Do you have the skill, strategy, and determination to defeat these powerful enemies and rise to the top? The clock is ticking, and the challenge awaits in Dimension Warrior.

content_descriptors.notes: W mojej grze głównym elementem rozgrywki jest walka z bossami, która obejmuje starcia na miecze i inne rodzaje broni. Chociaż walka jest intensywna, nie zawiera ona realistycznych przedstawień krwi czy brutalności, które mogą być nieodpowiednie dla młodszych graczy. Gra nie zawiera treści seksualnych, scen uzależnienia od narkotyków, ani innych motywów, które mogłyby być wrażliwe dla graczy.
